website_summaries.verdict: This is a fairly low price for an entire family of Calico Critters, and the Hopscotches are well-dressed, soft, and adorable.
pros: Includes father, mother, sister, and brother Hopscotch figures
Swap clothing with other Calico Critters toys
cons: The endearing Hopscotch twin babies are sold separately

customer_reviews.title: Love Calico Critters!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Calico Critters purchase and I have to say that I am very very pleased with it. This has to be one of the cutest toys I've ever bought! They are so cute and well crafted, although a bit on the pricey side, but the quality is wonderful in my opinion. I'm actually a toy collector (no judgments lol :) ) and I have wanted one of these Calico Critters sets ever since I was a little girl. I'm very impressed with this purchase. Thanks! 😊❤
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shaffett

customer_reviews.title: Love these guys!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are so cute, and a huge hit with my children I do wish the glasses would stay put, though. They don't link together well, and very easily slide off the face. At this point, I've actually set the glasses aside so they don't get lost. My 4 year old doesn't seem to mind that they are missing. If it bothers anyone, the grandparents are slightly smaller than the standard 'adult' size critters...but still taller than the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn B.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: They are almost identical to the ones I played with in the early 80s. Very cute. Love the detail.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, not designed well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with the Calico Critters school bus. The glasses on these critters are made from 2 pieces of delicate plastic which come unhooked much too easily. I tried to jerry rig the glasses around their heads with rubber bands but that didn't last long before coming apart. Even if the glasses are attached properly by the plastic hook they do not fit snugly on the face and move upward. Overall the quality of both the school bus and critters seems cheap. Would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: ACH

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved these little critters. She'd never seen or heard of them (seriously, Calico Critters... no cartoon??) but fell in love with them quickly. They're great quality toys, posable, their extremely high quality clothing can be swapped out for other outfits. I loved the attention to detail on these things. As soon as they were out of the packaging, she had them talking to one another and going on adventures. I can't wait to get her more of these and some other sets as well for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: instamatic

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, well-made little bunnies.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter had several members of this little bunny family. She loves them. I went down for a visit recently, and brought the grandparents with me. They were definitely a hit! They are very detailed and cute, and it made me smile that the grandparents are just slightly smaller than the parents. My granddaughter noticed it, and I told her that we shrink a little when we get older, which we do. We don't use the glasses, because they don't stay on too well. She now has all the family members, and she takes them with her everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: suemm88

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very happy to have a whole family to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great toy system overall. Though most of the products are made of plastic(what isn't these days) they seem to be well engineered and of suitable quality. I would say they are in the affordable range and represent good value for the money. Hopefully, the company will keep this mindset and keep the toys in the price reach of families. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality--perfect details!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived as promised--well in time for Christmas. They are the perfect size and thrilled the child who received them. The glasses were a little difficult to keep on at first, but they worked out fine. The clothing is so tiny, but is filled with details--even the little anchor on the granddad's coat looks authentic. Grandma's dress and pearls are perfectly detailed--even the lace on her dress and tiny little jacket! Needless to say they were a perfect addition to her collection and she loved them. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. I would say the animals are better quality than the toys. I really thought they would be smaller and light as a feather/hollow. They are very sturdy, a perfect playing size and have some weight to them. Not heavy by any means at all, just not like a marshmallow either. Super impressed with the quality of them from their bodies to their clothes! The nursery and bus we got are quite cheaper in how they go together. I feel like for the quality of these animals, the brand should provide wooden toys, not this light plastic, but that’s my first impression overall of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! We love calico critters. Purchased as a gift for my little to play with at grandma's house. I was happy to see the glasses and small accessories come separate in the package so we can keep those separate until my little is older and ready for them. Right now, she is younger than the recommended age and would just eat them. We will supervise her while she plays with them don't worry. They are standard adult cc toy height, just different accessories and clothing than other parent cc toys. Product was delivered quickly, right on time. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catsmeow

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricey. Quality not what others state.
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer stated, these came with flat hands not cupped hands as shown in the picture. They cannot hold accessories. Also, one of the bunny children's legs keeps popping out; happened on the day they were opened. They're cute bit pricey. Could have bought Lil Woodzeez for much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: mommakokobee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable rabbit family for Calico Critters collection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Calico Critters rabbit family along with their cozy cottage starter set for my four-year-old grand daughter and she squealed with joy when she saw them on Christmas Day. They are adorable and the Calico Critters collection has just about everything needed for this imaginative and creative world of play for the preschooler. They are currently her favorite toys along with her "stuffies" (i.e. stuffed animals).
customer_reviews.author: VickyNC

customer_reviews.title: Cute Calico Critters
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for our grand daughters birthdays, and first used them as a decoration for the top of their birthday cakes. They looked adorable as a decoration! Then we let them keep them, and they love them!
customer_reviews.author: m from mi

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Dolls
customer_reviews.text: My middle child has Autism. Her therapist had calico critters in office. She fell in love. I love that these dolls offer creative play without being a barbie doll. Barbie, even in her new forms and variations, still affects young minds negatively. I feel. So, I love that she can still enjoy dolls by using calico critters. Another bonus is that I got a family of 4 for the price of 1 barbie doll. And that the dollhouses take up minimal room, too.
customer_reviews.author: A happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa has a mustache!
customer_reviews.text: These grandparent critters are so adorable. They are a great addition to my collection. I had these growing up in the 80s and was so nostalgic when I saw these in the store. I bought these for my dollhouse I made. I think they’re a perfect fit and resemble my parents which makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne D'Elia

customer_reviews.title: Heirloom quality figurines!  Well made and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Calico Critters has some extremely adorable toys. We have bought their treehouse, schoolhouse, and several other structures, and they are all very high quality. Ditto for their figurines. These Hopscotch Rabbitt Family critters are adorable, and my daughter and friends can't stop playing with them! They bring out the best in educational and creative roleplay in kids, and are made very well. In fact, these are toys you would want to keep for a lifetime, instead of discarding them or giving them away once your child gets older.
customer_reviews.author: CQ DX

customer_reviews.title: Cute, albeit flawed.
customer_reviews.text: A couple things: 1) Their glasses are extremely finicky and fall off really easily. Plus, they’re in two pieces, which even makes assembling them a seemingly impossible task for little hands. They do realize kids use these, right? 2) Granny and Grandpa are (for whatever reason) smaller than the parents, and are of equivalent size to the kids. Sure, the designers could blame “oh, well old people get smaller as they age” but the real answer is that they’re just lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love the Grandparents
customer_reviews.text: The Hopscotch Grandparents are adorable. The actual figures aren't as bright white as they appear in pictures. It is a non issue for us. They are a must have for my daughters critter family. This was a great deal considering we aren't keeping the box. I love shopping Amazon warehouse deals.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Really cute set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute set and my daughter loved it because it reminds her of her own grandparents. I deducted a star for shipping. Although it arrived on time, it was shipped in an envelope and the box was crushed. Didn't matter to us because it was for my daughter and we're just going to open it, but I wouldn't be happy if I had ordered it as a gift and had to present a damaged box, or worse, if the little plastic pieces had been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Moon Pie

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute, and appear well made, but these grandparents are the same size as the child rabbits - shouldn’t they be the same size as the other adults? It says they are 3” in the description but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Boyle

customer_reviews.title: ... and the House also they are going to be happy Christmas morning they are so adorable
customer_reviews.text: My Grandaughters asked for this for Christmas so I sent the Critter Family with extra twins and the House also they are going to be happy Christmas morning they are so adorable, they are in Germany and Amazon has great things for Children and I appreciate the fact you mail APO.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Wernik

customer_reviews.title: These are very cute little bunnies and make a great family for the Calico Critters Tree House
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute little bunnies and make a great family for the Calico Critters Tree House. They are wearing adorable outfits and have really cute faces. My 5 year old granddaughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Seymourstreet

customer_reviews.title: Written by my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these critters!! They are so cute and my friend and I love to play with these! They are very soft and pretty detailed. What I did NOT like, of course, was the price! Some of them are 30$ which is crazy and impossible to find in your piggy bank especially if your looking to collect them all. they are totally worth it but I would definitely buy more if Amazon could lower its price! I highly recommend for any age! Keep in mind that they are small!
customer_reviews.author: Legallyhip

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable so far
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt sure about buying these guys because i felt they were pricey, but they are worth the price because of their durability. My 3 year old loves these calico critters. They have been in sand, dirt, stepped on, and so forth. They are still so soft and cute and not broken.
customer_reviews.author: B, Harrison

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to any child's toy box! It encourages creative play and family values. My 6 year old named her new Critters Grandma Pearl and Grandpa Jim, which is probably the cutest thing I have ever heard! I know that there are imitation Calico Critters out there but it extra cost is worth the high quality and durability of these sets!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ann

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We love Calico critters. I purchased a lighthouse, and complete Hopscotch family including grandparents for my daughter for Christmas. The item is as described, adorable and high quality. The only negative is that Amazon shipped the box in a padded envelope so there is minor damage to the box for both the family, as well as the grandparents. We didn't mind because we toss the box but if you are a collector you may not be happy with damage to the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Still the cutest Calico critter family
customer_reviews.text: The classics takes me back to my own childhood. I loved these when I was a little girl and sewing my daughter playing with them is quite a sight to see. They are made well and the details on the clothes are great. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: SL。214

customer_reviews.title: An adorable add-on set to the Rabbit family!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter specifically asked for this add-on set to the Rabbit family, and we were not disappointed. They were well made and fit in beautifully with all of the other Calico Critters items we own.
customer_reviews.author: HerRoyalDollness

customer_reviews.title: My 5yr old loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my daughter on her birthday. True to pictures. Even cuter in person. My daughter has had these for about two months and plays with them on a daily basis. They are still soft and velvety. The little house is very cute. Overall great toy for my 5 year old and great price here on Amazon, cheaper then Target or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: 760So.cal resident

customer_reviews.title: Very Detailed and Cute
customer_reviews.text: These Calico Critters were bought to add to my seven-year-old Grand daughter's growing collection. They, as all the rest of the Calico Critter characters, are remarkably detailed for their size and adorable. She loves playing with these new additions to her Calico family, and has created a Critter community by incorporating several of the vehicles and structures that go with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are...AWSOME!
customer_reviews.text: These calico critters are super cool! I have wanted them since I knew about calico critters! In January I got them. The only annoying thing is that When I was getting them out of the box, paper got rapped around their necks. But, It was easy to get off! But I forgot something that happens with almost every father critter is that the pants are hard to put on. ( the bros are same) so, aside from those 2 things, every thing is awsome!!! GET THESE ADORABLE THINGS!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful grandparents. They were a gift for my granddaughter and she loves them. She has the rest of the Hopscotch rabbits and these are the perfect addition to her ever-growing family. The glasses have a band in the back that helps keep them on the rabbit faces. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 year old granddaughter as a birthday gift and she loved them! She plays with them all the time. They are so adorable and cute. The clothing and glasses are removable. They brought lots of smiles to her face.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable rabbit family!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute family of rabbits. My daughter loves rabbits and loves playing with this cute little set. My only concern is that the tails seem very likely to get pulled off at some point.. especially by little brother. Hopefully that doesn’t happen but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little Family
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed Calico Critters before, and I never have any complaints. The detail that Calico critters puts into their little animals is amazing. Each animal has their own specific little outfits, and the feel of each animal is so soft. My little girl loves this rabbit family, she calls them her cute little rabbits. This set comes with mom, dad, brother and sister.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Calico Critters!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Calico critters for my granddaughter! She is almost 5 years old and she loves the little Hopscotch Family! You receive a miniature story book and it tells you the names of the family members and a cute story about the family!!! So cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a second set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set out of desperation one night. My girls had been fighting over the bunny family. They are the quality I expected with Calico Critters and have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

customer_reviews.title: So Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness!!! These are the cutest toys EVER!!!! I thought they would be much smaller like the size of hatchimals, but they are a lovely size for little hands. And good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect details, excellent price, mint packaging!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and adorable. Tiny accessories complete and included. Perfect for Calico Critters Seaside theme and nice to add some Grandparents! Also, most toys have arrived with packaging too damaged to use as gifts the last few years from Amazon, I've basically stopped buying toys here- but this price tempted me, so it was GREAT that the extra money was spent to send this in cardboard & it arrived in mint condition!
customer_reviews.author: Doug S

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small rabbit figures
customer_reviews.text: I chose this figures as a gift for my friend’s 7 years old son because he likes rabbit. It’s very cute and the package is nice and presentable as a gift. But it’s much more small than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but packaging was messed up
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and packaging looked liked it was opened previously. Wasn't very giftable, I had to tape it together and wrap it with paper.
customer_reviews.author: gauhar yessergepova

customer_reviews.title: Cute Critters
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Fits in the critter house and in the critter car and my kids love them. My preschoolers have learned that the tails are not secured well and fall off very easily. We still love our tail-less bunnies. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nadine O'brien

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Glasses dont stay on and break easily. Frustrating and not suitable for young children. .
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: ... more is there to say except that they are adorable. One word regarding age appropriateness
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say except that they are adorable. One word regarding age appropriateness. The glasses are fiddly for a 2-3 year old, but a 3-4 year old should be able to handle them without assistance. This is not a problem for us with our 32 month old grandchild, as he doesn't mind getting some help, but just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Cesca Lyons

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Calico Critters are so soft and cute! Their little outfits are so adorable and old fashioned! Definitely a hit at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Presteige Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Cute Calico Critters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this family for my 6 year old granddaughter's birthday. They were a hit. All the little kids at the party wanted to play with them. They are very cute and have a great deal of detail in their little faces.
customer_reviews.author: Billzer

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered these for herself. They arrived in the cute Calico Critters package in pristine condition. They are adorable & fuzzy. Our favorite feature is the darker ears. They are real and really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Spatty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and so cute! They pose really nicely, being jointed at the arms and legs. They can stand (and balance! always a plus) and sit, as well as reach their arms out, though they cannot hold objects with their hands. All of the outfits are lovely and very nicely detailed for as small as they are. They are hard plastic covered in flocking- the flocking is very pleasant to the touch. My only complaint is that I can't just buy one set, I end up wanting them all!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: 3-year-old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old niece loves "families" of just about anything, including rocks she picks up in the driveway, so I shopped for a family of small dolls. This was perfect! The dolls and the costumes are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a Button
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn't resist getting this little couple for my granddaughter. They are adorable. She loved them! She enjoys using her imagination to create wonderful stories with her Calico Critters.
customer_reviews.author: Billzer

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter is in love with calico critters...we pick up pieces on trips...she collects rooms and now has the house...intricate fun little hand animals
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: We love them
customer_reviews.text: This rabbit family is so cute and fit well in the Melissa and Doug Fold and Go dollhouse. My daughter likes to undress them and put them in the bathtub. After a month one of the tails has come off and their white fur is getting a little dirty. I may try to wash them but really what can I expect with a 2 1/2 year old?
customer_reviews.author: Alya HdF

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The bunny's are adorable.. The legs, arms and head turn for fun play. I also bought the blue car and the little house. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little bunnies ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about these little critters!! The detail is amazing!! Reminds me of the little Beatrix Potter animals from when I was a little girl!! Love it😍
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Anne Paul

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and my daughter loves playing with them! The only con I can think of is that they do tend to attract lint/fuzz, but that’s nothing a lint roller can’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews stating they were dissapointed that these characters couldnt hold anything. Well after looking at the bunnies in my local toy store those rabbits couldnt hold anything either.
customer_reviews.author: Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously cute
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously cute. Got these for our teenage daughter for xmas because she really couldn't get over them and how cute they were. Best Christmas present she got!
customer_reviews.author: Mary in Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 1st CC Family
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable, unboxed and already getting play. Great set to replace the one our 2yo yellow lab ate.
customer_reviews.author: AH and MM

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves calico critters! Great product. The quality almost makes you think their old fashion. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Chattygabby

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter and she loves them completely. Love how detailed they are and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jakeman

customer_reviews.title: Too cute, great qaulity!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first calico critter we purchased on Amazon we have absolutely falling on love with them and I'm very pleased with our purchase! Our six-year-old daughter loves them and they are just the right size for her to play and have fun!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMySevenLittles-Az

customer_reviews.title: We really like the quality and endless family type options.
customer_reviews.text: We found these to be a good size for the Ryan's Room Dollhouse we have. It really opens up the imagination for my kids to have little animal families they can play with too!
customer_reviews.author: C. K.

customer_reviews.title: I love Calico Critters
customer_reviews.text: I love Calico Critters. I got these for a great price on Prime Day. I got an extra set to keep on hand as a birthday gift. The figures are cute, pose-able and their clothes are adorable. I want to collect them all! They are fun to add to a doll house, or play with on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little things made with a lot of details and safe for kids
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: We Love Them
customer_reviews.text: These are the first calico critters we have ever purchased but it won’t be the last! My daughter and I think they are adorable and they go perfect in her dollhouse. They seem well made and the clothes even come off if you want to change them!
customer_reviews.author: RochelleTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Darling Bunnies
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter just loved these in her Easter baskets and plays with them all the time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My wife is making a collection of these toys. They are very cute and also if you want to give a gift, these are good options.
customer_reviews.author: Sarp Ciftci

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I bought this for my toddler so she can play with them in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: victoria bautista

customer_reviews.title: The Rabbit Grandparent Calico Critters are a perfect addition my youngster's collection
customer_reviews.text: The Rabbit Grandparent Calico Critters are a perfect addition my youngster's collection. The glasses can be on or off and they even look like grandparents. It will be nice to have the addition of Grandparents to the family.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: They are adorable.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 years old daughter loves Calico Critters and spent loads of time playing with her friends and by herself. Very well designed in every single detail. This grandparents are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: calico critters
customer_reviews.text: a bit pricey for a kids toy, my grand daughter loves this though
customer_reviews.author: Maj

customer_reviews.title: Cute Rabbit Family
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loved them. They got put immediately into the van I got her for Christmas. She is one happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: This item is a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in time for Easter for my niece. It was as described by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis applegate

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Package came all torn up and bent but the critters were fine :) my 6 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous mommy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the car and I'm impressed. It got the most attention from my 4 and 2 year old granddaughters at Christmas. Seems like something they will come back to over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter's Calico Critter collection. She loved it. Adorable little detailed figures. Arrived quickly and in good condition. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Fun and educational
customer_reviews.text: Children love to take their clothes on and off, great for developing fine motor skills. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect as a gift for imaginative play. High quality and still classic. I had a similar Calico Critters family when I was a child and am happy the quality remains the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hrasky

customer_reviews.title: Cute, just right for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My little grandson’s birthday- turned four. Really liked how cute they are as does his 5 year old brother.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gray

customer_reviews.title: 4 Granddaughters - 4 Sets of Calico Critters for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: With 4 granddaughters close in age I purchased 4 different sets of Calico Critters. I think they’ll enjoy having their own unique set and playing with them in my old playhouse as they all visit this Christmas. Really looking forward to the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Whitesel

customer_reviews.title: Cute little pair
customer_reviews.text: Cute little duo. Great for a 3 yeAr old or older. I have several other families but wanted the grandma and grandpa. I would recommend this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter requested a Calico Critter house from Santa this year. I saw these and thought no house is complete with out grandma and grandpa She loved them They are dressed so cute and the glasses were so adorable
customer_reviews.author: Robyn K

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents  rabbits are a must
customer_reviews.text: What granddaughter wouldn't love the rabbit grandparents? My granddaughter adores these 2. Their eye glasses are real tiny so be careful not to loose these little things.
customer_reviews.author: britlite3

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She was so excited to get them.
customer_reviews.author: seester

customer_reviews.title: Daughters Love these bunnies
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute I almost kept them for my Easter decorations than giving them to my daughters for Easter. I lost. Daughters enjoy playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Calico critters are well made and my daughter loves them. All their little clothes is interchangeable
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: These come in families!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the critters that live in the woods, have other kinds of critters as neighbors. They enjoy each other as they are and for who they are. Oh, to think on these things!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft and well made. Clothes come off easily and all the limbs are movable. My toddler loves them.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these. They move well, the clothes are high quality and can be changed(my daughters love that) and they don’t break easily. We haven’t had any of the Calico Critters break. Some of our Little Woodzeez have broken.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, as usual
customer_reviews.text: Another adorable Calico Critters set. I love the little details like grandma's pearl necklace sewn into her dress or grandpa's grey mustache. My daughter is so happy to have another generation of Calico for her stories!
customer_reviews.author: ESAB83

customer_reviews.title: The rabbit family is our granddaughters favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves this collection of rabbits! She has many calico critters and their houses. She spends many hours playing with them and their houses! I highly recommend if your child likes calico critters they will love the rabbit family.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N. Strawser

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter to go with other Country Critter stuff....she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute critter family for the dollhouse we purchased. Easy to take out of packaging and ready to play with immediately. Cute little gift!
customer_reviews.author: LisaA

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. It seems pretty durable so far. The tails got dirty very quickly from ambient dust ( in an estimated normal amount of dirt in a playroom. Would recommend if you need help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters Hasn't Forgotten the Elder Generation
customer_reviews.text: So pleased to see that Calico Critters hasn't forgotten the elder generation. My grandchildren play so lovingly with these. Wow, a complement!
customer_reviews.author: Bubblz

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loved the furry little critters
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loved the furry little critters. Intricate, easy to pose and hold and fun to play with. Much like the maple town characters from when we were kids that my sister had.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys
customer_reviews.text: So cute. My daughter loves these. The legs can move up and down for suturing or standing. The glasses are removable. They have a soft smooth velvet texture.
customer_reviews.author: L Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute Dolls!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda costly but worth the money compared to other doll house people.
customer_reviews.author: Capri Sunshine Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness!
customer_reviews.text: These fuzzy little creatures are too cute and were a great gift for my 4 year old niece who loves doll houses and animals. It's the best of both worlds and great for little ones with big imaginations.
customer_reviews.author: Safferdian

customer_reviews.title: Amazon President ice was 30+% cheaper than most other websites
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughters are getting everything calico Critter for their birthdays this year and these “grandparents” are the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: J. Runnels

product_meta.title: Calico Critters Hopscotch Rabbit Grandparents Dolls
product_meta.description:
Style:Hopscotch Rabbit FamilyMother, Heidi is always taking care of her family and keeps the house clean and nicely decorated. Father, Harlin enjoys planning all the fun community events in Calico Village. Sister, Bell is very cheerful and likes having fun with her family and friends. Brother, Skip is a great soccer player and is on his school's team. Calico Critters is a unique and adorable range of distinctive animal characters with charming and beautifully detailed homes, furniture and accessories. They live, work and play in an idyllic and wonderful place called Calico Village. These timeless, classic toys promote wholesome family values. These life-like, award-winning miniatures also inspire imagination and creativity. These adorable toys promote healthy cognitive development through pretend play. Acting out storylines will exercise narrative and critical thinking processes, while fine motor skills and dexterity improve as little ones manipulate the fun environments, critters and accessories.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
These adorable miniature animal families are proven favorites. These precious homes, detailed furniture environments and ready to play sets are wholesomely realistic so little girls can share their own experiences and values as they play. The wonderful Critters come with removeable clothing. The family Critters are poseable, with jointed arms and legs, and heads that turn. They are are 3" tall for parents, 2.25" tall for children, and 1.25" tall for baby twins. Sets mix and match. Build a whole Calio Critters village.
feature_bullets: Includes mother Heidi, father Harlin, sister Bell, and brother Skip
All come with removable detailed clothing, have jointed arms and legs, and heads that turn
Heidi and Harlin Hopscotch Rabbit measure approximately 3” tall. Bell and Skip Hopscotch Rabbit are approximately 2.25” tall
Can be used independently or with all Calico Critters houses
Mix and match with other Calico Critters play sets to create a whole Calico Critters village!
